metadata.title: Ethereum Explorer Etherscan Locks Avalanche, Base, BNB Behind Paywall as Network Demand Explodes
metadata.description: Etherscan has curtailed free API access. Avalanche, Base, BNB, and OP are no longer supported. The firm blamed increased on-chain activity for the “difficult decision.” ...
metadata.keywords: BNB, Avalanche, Etherscan, Ethereum Virtual Machine, API access, free API access, API calls
